name: Efeutute
watering_notes: Water once the top layer of soil has dried out
Drain pot if water cannot be fully absorbed
Alternatively, plants can be placed directly in water
Keep in water until the roots have fully soaked
fertilizing_notes: About once every two weeks during growth
Only once every 4-6 weeks in winter
pruning_notes: Remove stems at any length, directly after leaves
Dead leaves should always be removed
additional_notes: For climbing, get some kind of stick it can grow up on
